title: BONUS EPISODE #1 - Recommendations for Summer 2014 w/ Scott Arnold
itunes:title: BONUS EPISODE #1 - Recommendations for Summer 2014 w/ Scott Arnold
description:
This is the first BONUS EPISODE we will be releasing of many so get ready! They can come when you least expect it so please subscribe to the show. Here are a bunch of recommendations from the Summer of 2014 from records, movies and books, all from the mouth of contributor Scott Arnold. Please donate to the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
